name: point_selection
description: Launch an interactive GUI to select target points on the arena image, compute obstacle-aware A* paths for each click, display arena boundaries (solid and eroded inner) and obstacle spacings (dilated outer), allow saving or resetting the path, and return a status message upon completion.

data_folder.description: Path to the data folder containing 'frame_img.png', 'arena_corners.txt', 'obstacles.txt', and 'robot_pos.txt'. Defaults to 'Data'.

output_target_path.description: File path to write the computed path points. Defaults to 'Targets/path.txt'.

spacing.description: Number of pixels to inflate obstacles outward and erode the arena boundary inward. Defaults to 30.
